fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give someone the wrong number at night, changing them to a random role within 100 numbers of the role they were before.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn what role your target becomes.
- Your ability does not change win cons, only attributes/abilities.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the Town loses (this can win while dead).
